74 /*========== Extern Function Implementations ================================*/
75 bool SOA_IsPackCurrentLimitViolated(uint32_t current_mA, BMS_CURRENT_FLOW_STATE_e currentDirection) {
76  bool currentLimitViolated = false;
77  /* Only check if battery is not at rest. No overcurrent possible if battery is resting */
78  if ((currentDirection == BMS_CHARGING) || (currentDirection == BMS_DISCHARGING)) {
79  if (current_mA > BS_MAXIMUM_PACK_CURRENT_mA) {
80  currentLimitViolated = true;
81  }
82  }
83  return currentLimitViolated;
84 }
85 
86 bool SOA_IsStringCurrentLimitViolated(uint32_t current_mA, BMS_CURRENT_FLOW_STATE_e currentDirection) {
87  bool currentLimitViolated = false;
88  /* Only check if battery is not at rest. No overcurrent possible if battery is resting */
89  if ((currentDirection == BMS_CHARGING) || (currentDirection == BMS_DISCHARGING)) {
90  if (current_mA > BS_MAXIMUM_STRING_CURRENT_mA) {
91  currentLimitViolated = true;
92  }
93  }
94  return currentLimitViolated;
95 }
96 
97 bool SOA_IsCellCurrentLimitViolated(uint32_t current_mA, BMS_CURRENT_FLOW_STATE_e currentDirection) {
98  bool currentLimitViolated = false;
99  /* Only check if battery is not at rest. No overcurrent possible if battery is resting */
100  if (currentDirection == BMS_CHARGING) {
101  if (current_mA > (BS_NR_OF_PARALLEL_CELLS_PER_MODULE * BC_CURRENT_MAX_CHARGE_MSL_mA)) {
102  currentLimitViolated = true;
103  }
104  } else if (currentDirection == BMS_DISCHARGING) {
105  if (current_mA > (BS_NR_OF_PARALLEL_CELLS_PER_MODULE * BC_CURRENT_MAX_DISCHARGE_MSL_mA)) {
106  currentLimitViolated = true;
107  }
108  } else {
109  /* BMS_RELAXATION or BMS_AT_REST */
110  currentLimitViolated = false;
111  }
112  return currentLimitViolated;
113 }
114 
115 bool SOA_IsCurrentOnOpenString(BMS_CURRENT_FLOW_STATE_e currentDirection, uint8_t stringNumber) {
116  FAS_ASSERT(stringNumber < BS_NR_OF_STRINGS);
117  bool currentOnOpenString = false;
118  /* Current is flowing as soon as a current direction detected */
119  if ((currentDirection == BMS_CHARGING) || (currentDirection == BMS_DISCHARGING)) {
120  const bool stringClosed = BMS_IsStringClosed(stringNumber);
121  const bool stringPrecharging = BMS_IsStringPrecharging(stringNumber);
122  /* String appears to be open */
123  if ((stringClosed == false) && (stringPrecharging == false)) {
124  currentOnOpenString = true;
125  }
126  }
127  return currentOnOpenString;
128 }
129
